package.name: vizzy_description
package.description:
This package contains Vizzy's description (mechanical, kinematic, visual, etc.) for ROS2. The files in this package are parsed and used by a variety of other components. Most users will not interact directly with this package.
Acknowledgements: - Miguel Aragão, Rui Figueiredo and Plinio Moreno for the development of all the files regarding this package for ROS 1.
